snippet.title: P-Racing Reveal Trailer (Playdate)
snippet.description:
P-Racing is an upcoming racing game for Playdate. All the footage was captured on Simulator capped to 30 fps to match the final game performance.

Follow @RisolviPro on Twitter for more.

00:00 Intro
00:26 Gameplay
00:43 Tracks
00:48 Photo mode
01:02 City
01:21 Highway chase
